name: displeased
content:

Add to word list
annoyed or unhappy: displeased with I am very unhappy and displeased with what I have read.displeased at He says you weren't entirely displeased at the news. See
displease
More examplesFewer examplesHe was displeased that his daughter was marrying a man just one year younger than he was.They are very displeased with me.We're all unhappy and displeased with the position we're in, but I don't see any alternative.
